name: pedelman.brackets-surround
title: Brackets Surround
description: A tool which allows you to wrap selected text with special characters and HTML.
author: Patrick Edelman <patrick.the.edelman@gmail.com> (https://github.com/pedelman), Vitalii Cherniak <chernyak.vitaliy@gmail.com> (https://github.com/merlin-zaraza)
